home.howItWorks.description: Create your profile, add your photo and verify your phone number for added security.
home.step2.description: Search for rides or offer your own. Connect with travelers going your way.
home.step3.description: Travel together, share costs, and rate your experience to help the community.
home.benefit1.description: Share travel expenses and save money on your journeys.
home.benefit2.description: Fewer cars on the road means less pollution and traffic.
home.benefit3.description: Connect with like-minded travelers and make new friends.
home.benefit4.description: Enjoy a comfortable journey with verified drivers and passengers.
home.titlejourney.description: Join thousands of travelers who are already saving money and reducing their carbon footprint.

terms.title: Terms of Service
terms.subtitle: Please read these terms carefully before using GoTogether services.
terms.overview.title: Quick Overview
terms.overview.content: By using GoTogether, you agree to these terms. We provide a platform for ride-sharing in North Macedonia. You're responsible for your safety and following local laws.
terms.acceptance.title: 1. Acceptance of Terms
terms.acceptance.content1: By accessing and using GoTogether ("the Service"), you accept and agree to be bound by the terms and provisions of this agreement. If you do not agree to abide by the above, please do not use this service.
terms.acceptance.content2: These terms apply to all users of the service, including without limitation users who are browsers, drivers, passengers, and contributors of content.
terms.service.title: 2. Description of Service
terms.service.content: GoTogether is a ride-sharing platform that connects drivers and passengers traveling similar routes within North Macedonia. We provide the technology platform but do not provide transportation services.
terms.responsibilities.title: 3. User Responsibilities
terms.responsibilities.list4: • Comply with all applicable laws and regulations
terms.responsibilities.list5: • Treat other users with respect and courtesy
terms.responsibilities.list7: • Have valid vehicle registration and insurance
terms.responsibilities.list8: • Ensure vehicle is roadworthy and safe
terms.responsibilities.list9: • Follow traffic laws and drive safely
terms.safety.title: 4. Safety and Liability
terms.safety.content: GoTogether is not responsible for users' actions. You participate in ride-sharing at your own risk. Always verify driver and passenger identity before traveling.
terms.safety.content2: Users acknowledge that ride-sharing involves inherent risks. GoTogether doesn't guarantee the safety, reliability, or legality of users or their vehicles. We strongly recommend meeting in public places and sharing trip details with trusted contacts.
terms.payment.title: 5. Payment Terms
terms.payment.content: Payment arrangements are made directly between drivers and passengers. GoTogether doesn't process payments or guarantee payment completion.
terms.payment.list1: • Agree on payment method before the trip
terms.payment.list2: • Payments should cover fuel and vehicle costs only
terms.prohibited.title: 6. Prohibited Uses
terms.prohibited.content: The following activities are strictly prohibited on our platform:
terms.prohibited.list5: • Operating as a commercial taxi service
terms.prohibited.list7: • Attempting to hack or disrupt the service
terms.termination.title: 7. Account Termination
terms.termination.content1: We reserve the right to terminate or suspend accounts that violate these terms, engage in unsafe behavior, or receive consistently poor ratings from other users.
terms.termination.content2: Users may delete their accounts anytime through profile settings. Upon termination, service access will be immediately revoked.
terms.changes.title: 8. Changes to Terms
terms.changes.content: GoTogether reserves the right to modify these terms anytime. Users will be notified of significant changes via email or platform notifications. Continued service use constitutes acceptance of modified terms.
terms.contact.title: Contact Information
terms.contact.content: If you have questions about these Terms of Service, please contact us:
privacy.title: Privacy Policy
privacy.subtitle: Your privacy is important to us. This policy explains how we collect, use, and protect your information.
privacy.overview.title: Privacy at a Glance
privacy.overview.content: We collect only the information necessary to provide our ride-sharing service safely and effectively. Your data is never sold to third parties, and you control your privacy settings.
privacy.collection.title: 1. Information We Collect
privacy.collection.vehicleList1: • Vehicle make, model, year, and color
privacy.use.title: 2. How We Use Your Information
privacy.use.content: We use your information solely to provide and improve our ride-sharing service:
privacy.sharing.title: 3. Information Sharing
privacy.sharing.noticeContent: Your personal information is never sold to advertisers or third parties for marketing purposes.
privacy.sharing.legalContent: We may disclose information when required by law, to protect our rights, or to ensure user safety in emergency situations.
privacy.security.title: 4. Data Security
privacy.security.content: We implement industry-standard security measures to protect your personal information:
privacy.rights.title: 5. Your Privacy Rights
privacy.rights.content: You have control over your personal information and privacy settings:
privacy.rights.youCanList1: • Access and update your profile information
privacy.rights.youCanList2: • Control what information is visible to other users
privacy.rights.youCanList3: • Delete your account and associated data
privacy.rights.youCanList4: • Request a copy of your personal data
privacy.rights.note: To exercise these rights, visit your account settings or contact our support team.
privacy.retention.title: 6. Data Retention
privacy.retention.content: We retain your information only as long as necessary to provide our services and comply with legal obligations:
privacy.retention.activeContent: Information is retained while your account is active and for a reasonable period afterward to facilitate reactivation.
privacy.retention.deletedContent: Most personal information is deleted within 30 days of account deletion. Some data may be retained longer for legal compliance or safety purposes.
privacy.cookies.title: 7. Cookies and Tracking
privacy.cookies.content: We use cookies and similar technologies to improve your experience and analyze service usage:
privacy.cookies.essentialContent: Required for basic functionality like login sessions and security features.
privacy.cookies.analyticsContent: Help us understand how users interact with our service to make improvements.
privacy.cookies.note: You can control cookie preferences through your browser settings.
privacy.children.title: 8. Children's Privacy
privacy.children.noticeContent: GoTogether is not intended for users under 18 years of age. We do not knowingly collect personal information from children.
privacy.children.content: If we become aware that we have collected personal information from a child under 18, we will take steps to delete such information promptly.
privacy.changes.title: 9. Changes to This Privacy Policy
privacy.changes.content: We may update this Privacy Policy from time to time. We will notify you of any material changes by email or through the service. Your continued use of GoTogether after such modifications constitutes acceptance of the updated Privacy Policy.
privacy.contact.title: Contact Us About Privacy
privacy.contact.content: If you have questions about this Privacy Policy or how we handle your personal information:
contact.title: Contact Support
contact.description: Need help? Have a question? We're here to assist you. Send us a message and we'll get back to you soon.
contact.question1: • How do I book a ride?
contact.question2: • How do I cancel a booking?
contact.subject: Subject *
contact.successMessage: Thank you for contacting us. We've received your message and will get back to you within 24 hours.
about.title: About GoTogether
about.subtitle: We connect people traveling the same route to make transportation more affordable and sustainable.
about.whatWeDo.title: What We Do
about.whatWeDo.content: GoTogether is a ride-sharing platform that helps people find and offer rides across North Macedonia. Whether you're commuting to work, traveling between cities, or going to university, we help you connect with others going the same way.
about.feature1.title: Safe Community
about.feature1.desc: Verified users and rating system for safe travels
about.feature2.title: Eco-Friendly
about.feature2.desc: Reduce carbon footprint by sharing rides
about.feature3.title: Affordable
about.mission.title: Our Mission
about.mission.content1: To make transportation accessible and affordable for everyone while reducing environmental impact. We believe that by sharing rides, we can build stronger communities and create a more sustainable future.
about.mission.content2: Founded in 2025 in Skopje, GoTogether has helped thousands of people across North Macedonia save money and reduce their carbon footprint.
about.contact.title: Get in Touch
about.contact.content: Have questions or need help? We're here to assist you.
